ground_truth_reviews.comment: This conditional expression is very complex and difficult to parse at a glance. Long, nested boolean logic like this increases cognitive load and makes the code harder to debug and maintain. To improve readability, please refactor this by extracting the sub-conditions into well-named boolean variables. For example, you could create variables like `is_privileged_subscriber` and `is_long_term_user` to make the final `if` statement read more like natural language.

title: feat: Add authorization for post listing endpoint
body: This change introduces role-based access control to the `GET /posts` endpoint. Now, only administrators or long-term, verified premium/enterprise subscribers can view all posts. Other users will receive an empty list.
